languages.text: "Не надо, Домин. Он сломан духовно и физически. Увечья его сердца лишь усугубятся... Или хотя бы перережь ему сухожилия на руках и ногах, а затем отрежь язык. Тогда, каким бы монстром он ни стал, он будет хотя бы безопасен".

"Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."
languages.original_text: "Не надо, Домин. Он сломан духовно и физически. Увечья его сердца лишь усугубятся... Или хотя бы перережь ему сухожилия на руках и ногах, а затем отрежь язык. Тогда, каким бы монстром он ни стал, он будет хотя бы безопасен".

Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

"Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

languages.text: «Domin, no lo haga. Su cuerpo y su espíritu están quebrantados. Ayudarlo solo deformaría más su corazón... Si va a ayudarle, por lo menos corte los tendones de sus pies y manos y arránquele la lengua. Así no será un peligro, independientemente del monstruo en el que se haya convertido».
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

traits.locale_text: «Domin, no lo haga. Su cuerpo y su espíritu están quebrantados. Ayudarlo solo deformaría más su corazón... Si va a ayudarle, por lo menos corte los tendones de sus pies y manos y arránquele la lengua. Así no será un peligro, independientemente del monstruo en el que se haya convertido».

languages.text: 「ドミン、もういいです。彼は心身ともに壊れている。彼を助けても、心がさらに傷つくだけです…。もし彼を助けるなら、少なくとも手足の腱を切断し、舌を切り取るべきです。そうすれば、彼がどんな怪物になったとしても、もはや危険な存在ではなくなります」
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン、もういいです。彼は心身ともに壊れている。彼を助けても、心がさらに傷つくだけです…。もし彼を助けるなら、少なくとも手足の腱を切断し、舌を切り取るべきです。そうすれば、彼がどんな怪物になったとしても、もはや危険な存在ではなくなります」

languages.text: “不要这么做，秘者。他的身体与灵魂都已经残破不堪，帮助他只会让他的心灵更加扭曲……或者，如果你真的打算帮他的话，你至少应该挑断他的手筋和脚筋，之后割掉他的舌头。这样一来，无论他变成什么样的怪物，都不会对我们构成威胁。”
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

traits.locale_text: “不要这么做，秘者。他的身体与灵魂都已经残破不堪，帮助他只会让他的心灵更加扭曲……或者，如果你真的打算帮他的话，你至少应该挑断他的手筋和脚筋，之后割掉他的舌头。这样一来，无论他变成什么样的怪物，都不会对我们构成威胁。”

languages.text: "Domin, nicht! Er ist gebrochen in Körper und Geist. Ihm zu helfen, würde sein Herz nur noch weiter entstellen ... Oder wenn Ihr ihm schon helft, solltet Ihr zumindest die Sehnen in Händen und Füßen entfernen sowie seine Zunge herausschneiden. Dann wäre er keine Gefahr mehr, was für ein Monster er auch immer geworden ist."
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

traits.locale_text: "Domin, nicht! Er ist gebrochen in Körper und Geist. Ihm zu helfen, würde sein Herz nur noch weiter entstellen ... Oder wenn Ihr ihm schon helft, solltet Ihr zumindest die Sehnen in Händen und Füßen entfernen sowie seine Zunge herausschneiden. Dann wäre er keine Gefahr mehr, was für ein Monster er auch immer geworden ist."

languages.text: « Non, Domin, c'est peine perdue. Il est brisé dans son corps comme dans son esprit. Lui venir en aide ne ferait que défigurer davantage son cœur... Si vous insistez pour l'aider, vous devriez au moins trancher les tendons de ses mains et de ses pieds avant de lui couper la langue. De cette manière, quelle que soit sa nature, le monstre qu'il est devenu ne représentera plus un danger. »
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."

traits.locale_text: « Non, Domin, c'est peine perdue. Il est brisé dans son corps comme dans son esprit. Lui venir en aide ne ferait que défigurer davantage son cœur... Si vous insistez pour l'aider, vous devriez au moins trancher les tendons de ses mains et de ses pieds avant de lui couper la langue. De cette manière, quelle que soit sa nature, le monstre qu'il est devenu ne représentera plus un danger. »

languages.text: "Domin, yapma. Hem bedenen hem de ruhen bitmiş hâlde. Ona yardım etmek, yüreğini daha da karartacaktır... Yine de ona yardım etmek istiyorsan hiç değilse elleri ve ayaklarındaki tendonları koparıp dilini kes. Böylelikle ne tür bir canavara dönüşmüş olursa olsun artık tehlike teşkil edemez."
languages.original_text: "Domin, don't. He is broken in both body and spirit. Helping him would only disfigure his heart further... Or if you do help him, you should at least sever the tendons in his hands and feet, then cut out his tongue. That way, whatever monster he has become, he will no longer be a danger."
